Auth.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
Auth.signInError: Login failed, please check your email and password
Auth.networkError: Network error, please try again later

passwordRequirements.length: Password must be at least 8 characters
passwordRequirements.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordRequirements.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordRequirements.number: Password must contain at least one number

Auth.signUpError: Registration failed, please check your input

Settings.profileNameDescription: Used to identify your Profile on the Dashboard, CLI, and in the URL of your Deployments.
Settings.profileIdDescription: Used when interacting with the API.
Settings.usernameDescription: Your username for display and identification.
Settings.dateFormatDescription: Choose your preferred date display format.
Settings.timeFormatDescription: Choose your preferred time display format.
Settings.autoBackupDescription: Automatically backup your photos to the cloud.
Settings.maxFileSizeDescription: Set maximum file size limit for uploads.
Settings.twoFactorAuthDescription: Enable two-factor authentication for enhanced security.
Settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all data.
Settings.siteNameDescription: Set your website name, will be displayed in browser title and pages.
Settings.siteDescriptionDescription: Describe your website for SEO and social media sharing.
Settings.siteKeywordsDescription: Set website keywords separated by commas, helps with SEO.
Settings.appConstantsDescription: Configure core application parameters and limits.
Settings.imageSizeLimitDescription: Set maximum file size for uploaded images (MB).
Settings.enableFileCompressionDescription: Whether to enable automatic image compression.
Settings.defaultPhotoRatingDescription: Set default rating for newly uploaded photos (1-5).
Settings.addressLanguageDescription: Set language code for map address display.
Settings.perPagePhotosCountDescription: Set number of photos to display per page in gallery.
Settings.perPagePhotosCountInfiniteDescription: Set number of photos to load per page in infinite scroll mode.
Settings.shufflePhotosCountDescription: Set number of photos to display in shuffle mode.
Settings.siteSettingsDescription: Configure basic website information and SEO settings.
Settings.projectInfoDescription: Basic information about the CamLife project
